docs.text: just how inseparable is the team of sgt .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: martin riggs ( mel gibson ) and sgt .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: roger murtaugh ( danny glover ) ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: let's just say that when one partner asks the other partner to strip to his boxer shorts and then further asks him to run out into the middle of the road , flapping his arms while feverishly cackling like a chicken just to create a distraction , his partner actually does it !
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the familiar lethal weapon family is back , including rene russo , who is now the expectant mother of riggs' child and joe pesci as the soprana-like , foul-mouthed former accountant who has decided to become a private eye .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: new to the team is chris rock , also a fast-talking , up and coming detective .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: trouble seems to follow the two veteran detectives where ever they go , and in this film , that is no exception .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even when they are just taking a leisurely boat ride , they somehow manage to collide with a freighter ship .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: we here some ominous music , which clues us that a confrontation is about to happen .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gunfire ensues , and when it's all over , the detectives want to learn more about this freighter by questioning a chinatown crime lord .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although they don't know what they're looking for , their inquisitiveness causes the bad guys to take some action .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: and there's plenty of action here for two movies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: led by fighting sensation jet li , whose martial arts skill is nothing less than impressive , he does what he can to make sure that no one finds out what they are up to .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: li is ruthless in his approach , will kill anyone just to make a point , and develops enormous disdain for the two detectives .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there are terrific car chases , explosions and gunshot galore .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's a summer action recipe followed to the letter , and the result is nothing less than pure , unadulterated summer fun .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but even too many explosions can get boring .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: to counter that , we are treated to several amazingly choreographed fight sequences with jet li .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: luckily , he'd rather fight hand-to-hand instead of firing off guns .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meanwhile , when the detectives aren't reloading their guns or running from fireballs , they're engaged in sophomoric banter and silly conversations that provide a nice diversion from the hail of bullets .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: everybody gets in on the shtick .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: russo screams during her delivery , the crime lord has a few funny bits when he's being interrogated while being given laughing gas , and pesci and rock are very funny as they go at it discussing the drawbacks of having cellular phones .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: gibson and glover are always in sync and the film moves at a brisk pace to get to the final and terrific mano a mano .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: score one for the old guard .
docs.label: positive
